pages.title: Multitool
pages.text: You have long dreamed of using the same tool to chop wood, till soil, and mine ore, but nothing could merge it all together. Luckily the dark core has exactly the kind of power you need.
The finished tool works as a pickaxe, shovel, or axe, and thanks to the dark core it loses none of their efficiency while gaining even more durability.
Of course you wanted to attach a hoe as well, but there simply was no room left for it.
